Uses of Package
com.igormaznitsa.prol.io

Packages that use com.igormaznitsa.prol.io
com.igormaznitsa.prol.easygui The package contains a small GUI editor allows to edit prol scripts and start them. 
com.igormaznitsa.prol.io The package contains classes to work with input-output streams from the engine. 
com.igormaznitsa.prol.logic The package contains classes which are used to process goals and logic of the engine. 
 

Classes in com.igormaznitsa.prol.io used by com.igormaznitsa.prol.easygui
ProlStreamManager
          The interface describes an object which can be used to create reader and writer streams to be used by a prol engine
 

Classes in com.igormaznitsa.prol.io used by com.igormaznitsa.prol.io
DefaultProlStreamManagerImpl
          The class implements the ProlStreamManager interface and can be used to read-write files and read resources from JAR
ProlStream
          The interface describes an abstract stream object which can be used by the prol engine
